text: Iti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Huyai, ndichakuverengai zvamakarambidzwa naTenzi venyu; kuti musava munovasanganisa nechimwe chinhu mukunamata; mova munoitira vabereki venyu zvakanaka; musave munouraya vana venyu nekuda kwehurombo, Tisu tinokupai raramo imi pamwechete navo (vana); musave munoswedera pedyo neAl-Fawaahish (zvinonyadzisa, zvitadzo zvikuru kana cheupombwe) kunyangwe zvichiitwa pachena kana pakavanzika; uye musave munouraya uyo akarambidzwa naAllah kusara kwekunge pane chikonzero (chinoenderana nemutemo hweIslaam). Izvi vakakukomekedzai (Allah) kuti zvimwe munganzwisise.”
